ComicInfo.Title: untitled
ComicInfo.Summary: untitled: When our friends are overpowered by a very large Sumo, Bo steps in to assist. Gennin and Alex witness Shuriken in action. Bo and Sai unofficially join up with Team Nippon. They learn that the Yakuza are planning to construct a mechanical killing machine.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-24 08:00:46. [CVDB247920] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 01:11:24. [Issue ID 255849]
ComicInfo.Characters: Dai Li,Gennin Kimura [Samurai],Sai,Bo,Lee [Li Huay Chen] [Nunchaku],Alex Drake [Nightwynd],Simon Stringfellow [Thrasher],Shuriken
